trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 包含与关联的自变量<xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref> class.
This constructor calls the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> base constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>基构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing a new current input language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示新的当前输入的语言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示以前的当前输入的语言。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the initiated change of input language should be accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应接受还是拒绝启动的输入语言更改。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> event is raised when a change in input language has been initiated, but not completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>输入语言更改的已启动，但未完成时将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>

trans-unit.source: **true** to reject the initiated change of input language; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**拒绝启动的更改的输入语言; 否则为**false**。
